plot: Fed up with harassment by the LAPD while dressed as Spiderman at the Hollywood Highland Mall, a street performer decides to visit the Hollywood police station and get some answers while in his Spiderman costume.
title: Hollywood Crack Down
plot_es: Fed up with harassment by the LAPD while dressed as Spiderman at the Hollywood Highland Mall, a street performer decides to visit the Hollywood police station and get some answers while in his Spiderman costume.
plot_en: Fed up with harassment by the LAPD while dressed as Spiderman at the Hollywood Highland Mall, a street performer decides to visit the Hollywood police station and get some answers while in his Spiderman costume.
